casebody.data:
THE BOLER COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. TUTHILL CORPORATION (doing business as Reyco Granning Suspensions), Defendant-Appellee. No. 06-1510. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 9, 2007. Rehearing and Rehearing En Banc Denied May 17, 2007.

Before LOURIE, SCHALL, and BRYSON, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
